mapper.select: SELECT car.id AS car_id, camera.id AS camera_gun_id, channel.id AS channel_id, car.create_time,channel.`name` AS channel_name,camera.`name` AS camera_name,channel.speed AS channel_speed, car.license_plate,car.license_plate_color,car.speed AS car_speed, car.`status`, car.car_image FROM tb_car AS car JOIN tb_camera_gun AS camera ON car.camera_gun_id = camera.id JOIN tb_channel AS channel ON camera.channel_id = channel.id WHERE car.id = #{carId}

SELECT COUNT(tb_car.id) AS all_car_count FROM tb_car JOIN tb_camera_gun ON tb_car.camera_gun_id = tb_camera_gun.id JOIN tb_channel ON tb_camera_gun.channel_id = tb_channel.id WHERE tb_channel.id = #{channelId}

SELECT COUNT(tb_car.id) AS normal_car_count FROM tb_car JOIN tb_camera_gun ON tb_car.camera_gun_id = tb_camera_gun.id JOIN tb_channel ON tb_camera_gun.channel_id = tb_channel.id WHERE `status` = 0 AND tb_channel.id = #{channelId}
